questions.question: How would you rate your current work-life balance?
options: Excellent - I have plenty of time for personal activities
Good - Generally balanced with occasional busy periods
Fair - I often feel somewhat overwhelmed
Poor - Work regularly interferes with personal life

questions.question: Which cognitive style best describes your approach to problem-solving?
options: Analytical - I break down problems systematically
Intuitive - I rely on gut feelings and patterns
Collaborative - I seek diverse perspectives
Pragmatic - I focus on practical outcomes

questions.question: If you could instantly master one professional skill, which would you choose?
options: Advanced data analysis and visualization
Strategic negotiation and influence
Public speaking and executive presence
Creative problem-solving and innovation

questions.question: What workspace environment do you find most conducive to your productivity?
options: Quiet, private space with minimal distractions
Collaborative, open environment with team interaction
Flexible arrangement that varies based on task requirements
Remote work with digital collaboration tools

questions.question: Which philosophical framework best aligns with your decision-making process?
options: Consequentialism - Judging actions by their outcomes
Deontology - Following established principles regardless of outcome
Virtue ethics - Developing character traits that lead to good decisions
Pragmatism - Choosing what works in practical application
